name: Town Farm: Truck
description: Are you ready to be a farmer? Run your own farm in this small town. Grow wheat, feed cattle and sheep, harvest farm products, and process them into delicious food: popcorn, bread, and more! You can also drive a truck to share farm products and delicious food with your neighbors!   Content:  Grow crops What do you want to grow? Wheat, corns, or carrots? You can choose as you like! Then drive a seeding truck to plant the seeds. Remember to water the crops!  Its time to harvest! Hurry up and harvest the crops! Go and see what you have got! Wow! Wheat, corns, cucumbers, grapes...  Feed farm animals Come and try raising farm animals! Invite hens, cattle, and sheep to live on your farm! Feed them wheat and carrots to take good care of them.  Or maybe you prefer to manage the fish pond? Put small fish in the pond and feed them. Do you want to fish? No problem! Get your fishing net and enjoy fishing!   Process farm products Process farm products into delicious food and sell them to your town neighbors! Put the wheat in a bread maker and make tasty bread!  Switch on the popcorn machine, put the corn in it, with a bang! The popcorn is ready! You can also use a juicer to make grape juice, cucumber juice...  Drive the truck to deliver products Time for delivery! Start the truck, and lets go! Hold the accelerator lever and push forward to make the truck go faster! There is a right turn ahead. Be careful! Control the speed. Turn the steering wheel to the right and make a slow turn! Can you deliver the products to your neighbors on time?   Products are delivered on time! Your neighbors are satisfied with your farm products! You are such an outstanding farmer! Now, continue with your farm operation and deliver more farm products!
